General Instructions for ths JNotification Component!

  • AFTER THE PACKAGE's INSTALLATION, ADD DOMAINS AND SITE NAMES (THEY WILL BE THE RECEIVERS for example WWW.TEST.COM AS DOMAIN JOOMLA AS SITE NAME IF THE URL IS WWW.TEST.COM/JOOMLA).
  • ADD NEW NOTIFICATIONS AND THEN SELECT THE RECEIVERS. WAIT UNTIL THE MESSAGES WILL BE SEND TO THE RECEIVERS.
  • EDIT A NOTIFICATION AND THEN SELECT THE RECEIVERS. WAIT UNTIL THE MESSAGES WILL BE SEND TO THE RECEIVERS.
  • IF YOU WANT TO SEE THE INBOX PRESS THE INBOX BUTTON.
  • IF YOU WANT TO SEE THE OUTBOX PRESS THE OUTBOX BUTTON.
  • YOU MAY SEARCH FOR THE APPROPRIATE NOTIFICATION BY TITLE OR BY MESSAGE BODY.
  • AT ANY TIME YOU MAY CANCEL THE WHOLE OPERATION BY PRESSING THE CANCEL BUTTON.
